item.title: Implement testing in Golang
item.description: Hello dear readers, being a Junior to Mid Developer myself I’ve been of course faced to this weird “fear” of testing my code. Maybe it isn’t fear, maybe we just do not talk much about it. But either way I’ve been recently learning to program in Golang and I want it to do it seriously, in the right way. That’s why this time I did not skip the tests subject.
